review: Worked about 12 hours then I got different pop ups of why it wasn't working. 1) Network is not connected, even though when I went to the network setting it said "VERY STRONG SIGNAL"  2) Nexflix having problems. 3) Amazon not working 4) Network not strong enough. 5) Amazon having problems try later 6) Probably about 10 different pop ups but these were the most prevalent. Even set everything back to default and started over, but this was to no avail. This was a good tool when it worked and had everything that I needed on the TV it was installed on. When it did start to have problems it just became a complete frustration because of all the different reasons why it wasn't working. Even redid my WIFI as I thought that this could be my problem not the units problem. I spent HOURS with this problem.They should have one pop up and it just should say "THROW AWAY OR RETURN" this will save a lot of time and frustrations.
